fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Send a whisper to someone during the day, disguised as a player of your choice. You may do this any number of times.
- Deafen two players at night. During the next day, all whispers they send will not be given to their recepient.
- Blackmail a player at night. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You receive the whispers of everyone in the game.
